author: Patrick Cc:
description:
Papa John Schannter built a billion-dollar pizza empire that came crashing down after a leaked phone call. This video unpacks the rise and fall of John Schnatter.. from his aggressive marketing tactics to the scandal that forced him out of his own company. What followed was one of the weirdest public meltdowns in corporate history.

0:00 Pizza Dictator
10:57 Leaked Call 1
15:40 Leaked Call 2
21:16 Leaked Call 3
31:25 All A Set Up?
